text: Reports of a vote-by-mail apocalypse are greatly exaggerated: The nation's postal unions are considerably more confident USPS is ready for the election, @russellberman reports: https://t.co/eveaY1su8s

name: TheAtlantic
text: In "Where Law Ends," Andrew Weissmann, a top prosecutor on Robert Mueller's team, draws an affectionate portrait of his old boss‚Äîbut begrudgingly admits that the Russia investigation's "extreme fairness" doomed it, George Packer writes. https://t.co/MOPW51Zcgl

name: TheAtlantic
text: That‚Äôs a wrap on The Big Story: Election 2020. #TheAtlanticFest will be live through Thursday, 9/24. Visit https://t.co/TQM4fna5Ig to check out the schedule.
